entry.title: Yunheng Li
entry.content: About meI am currently a Master student at the Human Perception Computing Lab of Dalian University of Technology, advised by Prof. Lin Feng and Shenglan liu.My research interests include Temporal action Segmentation, Skeleton-based Action Recognition, and Graph Neural Networks. Education 2020 - Now, M.Sc. in Computer Science and Technology, Dalian University of Technology. 2016 - 2020, B.Sc. in Electrical Engineering and Automation, Dalian University of Technology. Activity and Service Reviewer for CVPR 2022. Reviewer for Neurocomputing.
